scripts.cf-typegen: echo 'Run: nix shell nixpkgs#wrangler -c wrangler types'
scripts.build: waku build --with-cloudflare && cp -r public/fonts dist/assets/fonts 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r public/wasm dist/assets/wasm 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.start: echo 'Run: nix shell nixpkgs#wrangler -c wrangler dev'
scripts.start:nix: nix shell nixpkgs#wrangler nixpkgs#nodejs -c wrangler dev
scripts.d1:migrate: echo 'Run: nix shell nixpkgs#wrangler -c wrangler d1 execute init --file=./migrations/ddl.sql'
scripts.d1:list: echo 'Run: nix shell nixpkgs#wrangler -c wrangler d1 execute init --command="SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table' ORDER BY name;"'
scripts.r2:create: echo 'Run: nix shell nixpkgs#wrangler -c wrangler r2 bucket create waku-data'
scripts.r2:upload-sample: echo 'Upload parquet files: nix shell nixpkgs#wrangler -c wrangler r2 object put waku-data/sample.parquet --file=./data/sample.parquet'
scripts.r2:list: echo 'Run: nix shell nixpkgs#wrangler -c wrangler r2 object list waku-data'
